packagegui.title: BIND: XMLRPC Sync

field.description: Select a sync method for BIND.

option.name: Sync to configured system backup server
Do not sync this package configuration

field.description:
Set master zone ip you want to use to sync backup server zones with master.
Note: All master zones will be configured as backup on slave servers.

Do not forget to:
     Create firewall rules to allow zone transfer between master and slave servers.
     Create ACLs with these slave servers.
     Include created ACLs on allow-transfer option on zone config.
